Surprise Menu.Description:
- A delicious assortment of **freshly prepared dishes**.
- A Surprise 3-Course Experience.
- Each course is a unique surprise, made to order, for a truly one-of-a-kind dining experience!

Appetizers.Description:
- **Crispy bread** topped with fresh tomatoes, garlic, and basil.
- A light and flavorful start to your meal.

- **Warm breadsticks** coated with garlic butter and parmesan.
- Perfectly crispy and savory.

- **Creamy dip** made with spinach, artichokes, and cheese.
- Served with crunchy crackers for dipping.

Soups & Salads.Description:
- **Fresh romaine lettuce**, croutons, parmesan, and Caesar dressing.
- A perfect balance of crunchy and creamy.

- **Creamy tomato soup** with a hint of basil.
- Perfect for dipping with your favorite bread.

Soups & Salads.Dish: Greek Salad with Feta Cheese and Olives
Soups & Salads.Description:
- **Cucumbers, tomatoes, feta, and olives** with a lemon-oregano dressing.
- Light and refreshing with bold flavors.

Main Courses.Dish: Grilled Chicken with Lemon Herb Sauce
Main Courses.Description:
- **Grilled chicken** served with a fresh lemon herb sauce.
- Tender and flavorful with a citrusy touch.

- **Pasta with eggs, bacon, parmesan, and black pepper**.
- A creamy and savory Italian classic.

Main Courses.Dish: Beef Tenderloin with Garlic Mashed Potatoes
Main Courses.Description:
- **Juicy beef tenderloin** paired with creamy garlic mashed potatoes.
- A hearty and satisfying combination.

- **Stir-fried vegetables** and tofu in a savory sauce.
- A vibrant and healthy option for vegetarians.

- **Juicy shrimp** cooked in a garlic butter sauce.
- Served over linguine pasta for a satisfying meal.

Side Dishes.Dish: Roasted Brussels Sprouts with Balsamic Glaze
Side Dishes.Description:
- **Crispy roasted Brussels sprouts** drizzled with balsamic glaze.
- A sweet and savory complement to any dish.

- **Golden sweet potato fries** with a perfect balance of sweetness and salt.
- A crispy and satisfying side.

- **Rich and creamy spinach** cooked to perfection.
- A classic favorite with a velvety texture.

Desserts.Dish: New York Cheesecake with Strawberry Topping
Desserts.Description:
- **Smooth and creamy cheesecake** topped with fresh strawberries.
- A classic dessert with a sweet and tangy topping.

- **Coffee-soaked ladyfingers** with mascarpone cream.
- A rich and indulgent Italian dessert.

- **Warm chocolate cake** with a gooey molten center.
- Served with vanilla ice cream for the perfect combination.

Desserts.Dish: Fruit Salad with Honey and Mint
Desserts.Description:
- **Fresh seasonal fruits** drizzled with honey and topped with mint.
- A light and refreshing dessert option.

Drinks.Description:
- **Sweet and sour lemonade** made with fresh lemons.
- A refreshing drink to cool you down.

- **Cool iced green tea** perfect for a hot day.
- A light and refreshing beverage to accompany your meal.

- **Strong Italian espresso** served black.
- A rich and bold coffee experience.

- **Creamy mango smoothie** made with fresh mangoes.
- Sweet and tropical, perfect for a treat.

- **Smooth red wine** available in Merlot or Cabernet Sauvignon.
- A perfect pairing with any of your main courses.
